    • checkValid

      public static boolean checkValid​(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      A function that checks two pieces against each other to see if they can be placed on the board
      Parameters:
      x1 - the x of the first piece
      y1 - the y of the first piece
      x2 - the x of the second piece
      y2 - the y of the second piece
      Returns:
      boolean: true if the pieces can be placed on the board, false if they can't

    • checkLine

      public static int checkLine​(int[] board, int y)
      A recursive function that checks the board for solutions
      Parameters:
      board - the board to check
      y - the line to check
      Returns:
      int: the number of solutions found
